summary: Completed P1/P2 feature testing for Maestro Habitat. All features working: Reminders page with session hours (1h,2h,4h,12h,24h) and payment days (1,3,7) selection, Subscription page with plan display and premium features, Tax Reports page with generate and download functionality, Notification settings with toggle persistence. Fixed translation keys for subscription features and backend user lookup for tax reports.
passed_tests: Frontend: Reminders page loads with all options - PASSED
Frontend: Session hours buttons (1h,2h,4h,12h,24h) clickable - PASSED
Frontend: Payment days buttons (1,3,7 days) clickable - PASSED
Frontend: Weekly summary toggle works - PASSED
Frontend: Subscription page shows Premium Active status - PASSED
Frontend: Subscription page shows all premium features - PASSED
Frontend: Tax Reports page shows year cards - PASSED
Frontend: Tax Reports generate button works - PASSED
Frontend: Tax Reports download button appears after generation - PASSED
Frontend: Notification Settings page shows all toggles - PASSED
Frontend: Notification Settings toggles save to backend - PASSED

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Missing translation keys for subscription premium features
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added feature_access_to_all_coaches, feature_session_recordings, feature_progress_reports, feature_detailed_billing, feature_priority_notifications, feature_custom_reminders, feature_leave_reviews, feature_ad-free_experience
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Subscription page was showing raw translation keys like 'subscription.feature_access_to_all_coaches'

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: User lookup failing with 'User not found' error
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Changed user lookup to use ObjectId instead of user_id field: await self.db.users.find_one({'_id': ObjectId(user_id)})
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Tax report generation was failing for all users

context_for_next_testing_agent: P1/P2 features fully tested and working: 1) Reminders page has session hour options (1,2,4,12,24h) and payment day options (1,3,7 days) with weekly summary toggle - all save to backend via /reminders/config endpoint, 2) Subscription page shows Premium Active status with all premium features properly translated, 3) Tax Reports page shows year cards with generate and download functionality working after backend fix, 4) Notification Settings page at /notifications-settings has 6 toggles that persist to backend via /user/notification-settings endpoint. Fixed translation keys in en_US.json and user lookup in tax_report_service.py.
